about_the_game:
Designed in direct collaboration with CYRILmp4, one of Europe’s leading FPS content creators, this latest Sniper Ghost Warrior Contracts 2 DLC weapon skin pays tribute to the sharpshooter’s super-sleek monochrome branding. 

A master with the sniper rifle, Cyril’s known to his community for his insanely accurate aim, and while his branded weapon skin might not grant you the same level of precision, at least you can look almost as good as the deadeye-streamer while lining up that headshot! 

Features: 
  • CYRILmp4 Weapon Skin - Usable across all in-game weapons

*Requires Sniper Ghost Warrior Contracts 2 base game
